events.query: It's time to take your morning medications. Take all medications as directed by your physician
events.requery: Did you take your morning medications?
events.details: Amlodipine, Aspirin, Atorvastatin, Hydrochlorothiazide, Levothyroxine, Losartan and Aldactone

events.query: It is time to perform your home exercise program.
events.requery: Did you perform your exercise routine that you were supposed to do at 1 PM?
events.details: Perform your exercise routine as described by your physical therapist.

events.query: It's the time to do an ECG. Do you want to try it now?
events.requery: Did you do the ECG that you were supposed to do at 3 PM?
events.details: Press the crown twice to go to Apps, tap on the ECG app, and follow the instructions.

events.query: It's time to take your nightly medications. Take all medications as directed by your physician
events.requery: Did you take your nightly medications?
